### __Version 1.5__
#### 09-12-2019


_Functionality_

- Data table shows metabolites with associated GO's
- Clicking on a metabolite in the graph shows its associated GO's
- Selecting a shortest path will recalculate the GO's in statistics
- Data table shows a table with metabolite per Extra- and Intracellular locations

_Fixes_

- Fixed an issue where the 'Hover' mode for node labels crashed the app
- Node labels are now instantly updated when switching options


_Other_

- Organized Data Table visualizations in compartments
- Organized Statistical visualizations in compartments
- Fixed some visual bugs that would cause the screen to scroll down when selecting a lot of metabolites
